title: Digital Content Grant (DCG) – Prime Grant
description: Supports larger scale development, production and commercialisation of digital content products. Ceiling: RM500,000. Duration: up to 9 months.
sector: Digital Content (Animation, Games, Creative Technology, Digital Comics)
eligibility: Companies incorporated in Malaysia ≥1 year, ≥51% Malaysian equity, min share capital RM20,000, revenue ≤ RM5m, Malaysia Digital or MSC status. Cannot be broadcaster/OTT/media company. Must not be current MDEC/FINAS/MyCreative Venture grant recipient. One year cooling off for past MDEC grantees.
requiredDocs: Project proposal, company registration docs, audited accounts, declarations of relationships/legal proceedings, pitching deck.
